title: Beautiful Nearly New Home In Quiet Neighborhood!
posting_body: Beautiful Craftsman in highly desired Rainier Vista!
This open concept floor plan has a great layout with 4 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, Den, & Bonus Room!
Living Room has Extra large windows, cozy gas fireplace, & a glorious Mt Rainier view!
Kitchen features elegant ceramic tile counters & backsplash, gas cooking, Stainless Steel appliances, huge center island with breakfast bar, & custom shaker cabinets!
Just off the kitchen, you'll find the spacious covered deck overlooking the peaceful, serene green belt with Mt Rainier nestled in the background!
Master Bedroom features vaulted ceiling, Mountain views, 5-pc bathroom with soaking tub & walk-in closet!
Other features include: Beautiful manufactured Hardwood flooring on main, arched walk-throughs, & fresh paint!
Just minutes to parks, schools, shopping & freeway access!
Great play park and play court (part of HOA) just a short walk away which also has an entry to the trails.
This home is conveniently located at 18415 SE 244th St, Covington, WA  98042.
Kent School district:  Crestwood Elementary, Mattson Middle School, Kentlake High School.
Driving Directions:
From WA-18W take the SE 256th St Exit.
Turn right onto SE 256th St. Turn right onto 180th Ave SE/Wax Rd.
Turn Right onto SE 244th St. House is on right
Lease Terms:
This lovely home is available for lease for $3200 per month.
No smoking.
No Pets.
First month’s rent + $3,200 security deposit due up front + $350 non-refundable fee. 12  month lease.
$44 lease application fee.
Tenant responsible for all utilities & lawn care.
Application requirements:
- positive credit history (min score 700)
- no history of property management collections
- no history of evictions (unlawful detainers)
- must have proof of employment
-landlord cannot re-use applications or credit reports
-tenant will be required to have a landscape contract
For more information text Melissa at
